message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a high-value product. I think you'll find it's a great fit for your needs. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the opportunity, $15000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to offer $8000 for the product. Let me know what you think.
I understand that $8000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer you a price of $12000, which is the minimum I'm willing to accept. If you're still interested, let me know!
Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $12000. While I'm still interested, that's still a bit more than I can afford. I'm willing to go to $9000. Let's see if we can meet in the middle.
I'm not willing to go all the way down to $9000, but I can meet you in the middle at $11000. This is my final compromise, let me know if you're interested!
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility.  $11000 is still a bit high for me, but I'm willing to go to $10000.  Let's see if we can finally close this deal.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not willing to go all the way down to $10000. I can meet you at $10500, but that's as low as I can go. Let's see if we can make a deal.
Alice, I'm really trying to make this work. I'm only able to go up to $10250.  Let's close this deal.  This is my final offer.
I'm not willing to go below $10000, as that's my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you at $10000, but I'm not budging any further. This is my final offer.
